vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 5 to the professional services contract with Stantec Consulting Services, Inc. dba Stantec for construction phase services associated with the Bachman Dam and Spillway Improvement Project - Not to exceed $2,580,646.00, from $8,497,171.00 to $11,077,817.00 - Financing: Water Construction Fund ($2,081,025.00) and Water Capital Improvement F Fund ($499,621.00)
